document_title.reason: Large, prominent top-right text 'INVOICE' acting as the document title/header label; visually distinct and aligned at top.

vendor_name.reason: No visible vendor/issuer name block in the header area of the provided image â€” top-left area is blank (no company/seller name detected).

vendor_address.reason: No vendor postal address detected under a vendor name; header lacks an identifiable issuer address block.

vendor_phone.reason: No telephone number visible in the header/contact area of this document.

vendor_email.reason: No email address visible in the header/contact area of this document.

vendor_website.reason: No website/URL visible in the header area.

client_name.reason: Text block labeled 'ISSUED TO:' shows 'Richard Sanchez' as the first line under that label; typical recipient name position.

client_address.value:
Thynk Unlimited
123 Anywhere St., Any City
client_address.normalized_value: Thynk Unlimited, 123 Anywhere St., Any City
client_address.reason: Lines under the recipient name (under 'ISSUED TO:') show the company and address: 'Thynk Unlimited' and '123 Anywhere St., Any City'. Combined into a single address string for normalization.

invoice_number.reason: Right-side panel label 'INVOICE NO:' followed by '01234' clearly indicates the invoice identifier.

terms.reason: No explicit payment terms (e.g., 'Net 30') visible in the invoice details area.

invoice_date.reason: Right-side label 'DATE:' followed by '11.02.2030'. Interpreted as day.month.year and normalized to ISO-8601 (2030-02-11).

due_date.reason: Right-side label 'DUE DATE:' followed by '11.03.2030'. Interpreted as day.month.year and normalized to ISO-8601 (2030-03-11).

items.reason: Tabular area labeled 'DESCRIPTION / UNIT PRICE / QTY / TOTAL' with six rows. Each row's description is left column, unit price in middle, qty near right, and total with '$' at far right.

item_description.reason: Multiple line-item descriptions exist and were mapped into items[]. Use items[] for per-row descriptions; single-field 'item_description' not applicable.

item_quantity.reason: Quantities are provided per row and included in items[]. No single global item_quantity field applies.

item_unit_price.reason: Unit prices are provided per row and included in items[]. No single global item_unit_price field applies.

item_amount.reason: Line amounts are provided per row and included in items[]. No single global item_amount field applies.

subtotal.reason: Label 'SUBTOTAL' on bottom-right with value '$400' directly printed in the totals area; normalized to numeric 400.0 (currency handled separately).

discount.reason: No 'Discount' or deduction line visible in the financial summary area.

tax_rate.reason: Near totals there is a 'Tax 10%' label. Captured the textual percent and normalized to numeric percent 10.0.

tax_amount.reason: No explicit tax monetary amount printed next to the tax label; although total implies $40 tax, the document does not show a separate tax amount value, so not inferred/ invented.

total.reason: Bottom-right 'TOTAL' label shows '$440' as the final amount due; normalized to numeric 440.0.

currency.reason: Monetary values in the document use '$' symbol. Normalized to common currency code 'USD' (symbol-based inference).

payment_instructions.normalized_value: Borcele Bank; Account Name: Adeline Palmerston; Account No: 0123 4567 8901
payment_instructions.reason: Block labeled 'PAY TO:' contains the payment/bank details; captured full block text as free-form payment instructions.

bank_name.reason: Under 'PAY TO:' the first line is 'Borcele Bank' indicating the receiving bank name.

bank_account_name.reason: Payment block shows 'Account Name: Adeline Palmerston' which is the payee/account holder name.

bank_account_number.reason: Payment block shows 'Account No.: 0123 4567 8901'. Normalized by removing spaces to a continuous digit string '012345678901'.

notes.reason: No separate free-form 'Notes' or memo block detected in the visible document area.

document_page_number.reason: No page number or pagination information visible on this single-page invoice.
